name: Updated Whiskey-Ginger  Highball
description: A dressed up version of an easy favorite, galvanized by fresh ginger and orange.
recipeIngredient: 2 slices raw, peeled ginger (about the size of a quarter)
1 bar spoon Morris Kitchen ginger	syrup

recipeInstructions.text:
Muddle one slice of ginger with 
syrup and a bit of ginger beer 
in the bottom of a highball glass. 
Fill glass with ice cubes.

Add rye and stir with a bar spoon. 
Add ginger beer to fill.

Run the other slice of ginger around 
the rim of the glass, then discard. 
Twist orange peel over drink to release 
oils, then drop into glass.
